titles.title: A resolution honoring Missourians who made the ultimate sacrifice in Afghanistan.
A resolution honoring Missourians who made the ultimate sacrifice in Afghanistan.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Star Print ordered on the resolution.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that Marine Corps Lance Corporal Jared Schmitz and his fellow Missourians who made the ultimate sacrifice during the war in Afghanistan represent the best of Missouri and the United States. The resolution also honors those service members and their families.
